scenario_text.value: Man, I’ve got butterflies in my stomach...
Me too... My legs won’t stop shaking...
What should I say to Aoi and Minoru?
Really? You too? Don’t see that every day.
You think? I get scared too, y’know.

Yeah, I guess you get tense sometimes, too.
Hearing that actually makes me feel better.
Hahaha! Yeah, I know what you mean!

We’d better get psyched up.
That’ll get us through this.

Whoa, Takuma...
You’re more macho than I thought!

Even if you say so, I can’t... I don’t know
how to get “psyched” in the first place...
You think I haven’t tried that already?

Me too... Deep breaths haven’t helped at all.
The shaking won’t stop...
